```{r}

library(spatstat)
centrLL
```


```{r}
riprange<-   owin(xrange=c(-86,-81), yrange=c(30,35), poly=NULL, mask=NULL,
unitname=NULL, xy=NULL)
ripPointmap<-ppp(x=centrLL$long,y=centrLL$lat, window= riprange)
plot(ripPointmap)

 

plot(Kest(ripPointmap))

```
```{r}
pcfplot <-pcf(ripPointmap)
plot(pcfplot)

```
